EmailTemplate.name: 08-02-21 Banking India webinar Thank you email.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our NCR webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for registering for our NCR webinar. You can access the presentation here <[[https://ncr.webex.com/ncr/lsr.php?RCID=f3c7db7c9db6b26166d0957faef7db7d]]>. If you weren’t able to join don’t worry, the details are all in the presentation. If you attended the session, we hope you saw the tremendous value and enjoyed our expert panel discussion on technology solutions that can help you improve your cash handling and save money. Learn more about ATM as a Service <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/contact-us/banking-marketing-opt-in]]> or sign up to our banking customer newsletter <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/contact-us/banking-marketing-opt-in]]>. . Get in touch today! <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
